property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories.

property.name: mapred.reduce.parallel.copies
property.description: The default number of parallel transfers run by reduce during the copy(shuffle) phase.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: Default block replication. The actual number of replications can be specified when the file is created. The default is used if replication is not specified in create time.

property.name: dfs.block.size
property.description: The default block size for new files.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks
property.description: The default number of map tasks per job. Typically set to a prime several times greater than number of available hosts. Ignored when mapred.job.tracker is "local".

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks
property.description: The default number of reduce tasks per job. Typically set to a prime close to the number of available hosts. Ignored when mapred.job.tracker is "local".

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of map tasks that will be run simultaneously by a task tracker.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of reduce tasks that will be run simultaneously by a task tracker.

property.name: mapred.compress.map.output
property.description: Should the outputs of the maps be compressed before being sent across the network. Uses SequenceFile compression.
